Text: This movies rocks. Thanks for uploading. You and djfred are the best uploaders on this site THX.
I am downloading this torrent and i send you a comment if it is a good torrent!!!! :)

For anyone wanting to burn this to a disc, you'll have o shrink it down a bit, the files are a measly 7mb too much to allow a burn in Nero. That was kinda frustrating to miss by such a small amount.

The menu screen is very misleading as to the quality of the film. The ripper saved space by shrinking the menu only down several hundred mb so it does appear all distorted and a poor quality but the movie is a nice clean picture with no flaws that I could see using VLC to watch it.
Something is wrong with audio- VTS_01_3, instead of audio from the movie all i can hear is comments of the actors about the movie...?? waited 4 days to download this movie....

This movie has multiple audio tracks so anyone only getting the commentry should change tracks from audio menu- use players like vlc. Thx for the upload though not the greatest of qualities but thx anyway.
